lyrics.stanza: To be baptized in the Spirit Is to get into the Spirit And to be lost in Him. To drink of the Spirit Is to take the Spirit in And have our being saturated with Him. By these two procedures We are mingled with the Spirit. To be baptized in the Spirit Is the initiation of the mingling And is once for all. To drink the Spirit Is the accomplishment of the mingling And is perpetual forever.
